title: Deploy DeepSeek-R1 Models on Amazon Bedrock
author: Oladimeji Sowole
description: This tutorial guides you through the end-to-end process of deploying and optimizing the DeepSeek-R1 Distill Llama model on Amazon Bedrock.
cntitle: 在 Amazon Bedrock 上部署 DeepSeek-R1 模型
cndescription: 本教程将指导您完成在 Amazon Bedrock 上部署和优化 DeepSeek-R1 Distill Llama 模型的端到端过程。
